Data.Name: Release Sphere
Data.Description: Bring the sphere close to the cube.

Text.defaultText: Release the sphere next to the cube.

Data.Name: Grab Again
Data.Description: You did not bring the sphere to the cube. So grab it again.

Text.defaultText: You released the sphere in the wrong area!
You need to bring the sphere next to the cube. If you fail, the steps will repeat.
